ThingDef.label: profaned war axe
ThingDef.description: A sinister, one-handed axe. It is weighty but easy to handle, capable of delivering brutal chops and slashes.\n\nAttacks with this weapon can cause a build-up of rot stink exposure.

ThingDef.label: profaned scimitar
ThingDef.description: A sinister, single edged curved sword. It is relatively light and capable of delivering swift, deadly slashes.\n\nAttacks with this weapon can cause a build-up of rot stink exposure.

ThingDef.label: profaned shotel
ThingDef.description: A sinister, sharply curved bladed weapon. Due to its shape, attacks with this weapon can slip through an opponents guard and find weak points in their armor.\n\nAttacks with this weapon can cause a build-up of rot stink exposure.

ThingDef.label: profaned club
ThingDef.description: A crude club, roughly carved from stone.

ThingDef.label: weathered short bow
ThingDef.description: A simple, wooden shortbow. It is flimsy and weathered but still functional.

ThingDef.label: scourge knight greatsword
ThingDef.description: One of the favoured weapon of the scourge knights, a large, two-handed greatsword adorned with bone. It can deliver deadly, sweeping slashes.\n\nAttacks with this weapon can cause a build-up of rot stink exposure.

ThingDef.label: grasping dead greatsword
ThingDef.description: A scourge knight greatsword further augmented via profane alchemy, allows the wielder to call upon the dead to attack from below, damaging and slowing anything in the area.\n\nAttacks with this weapon can cause a build-up of rot stink exposure.

li.label: grasping dead
li.description: Call upon the dead to attack from below, damaging and slowing anything in the area.

ThingDef.label: scourge knight greataxe
ThingDef.description: One of the favoured weapon of the scourge knights, a large, two handed greataxe adorned with bone. It is capable of delivering brutal chops and slashes.\n\nAttacks with this weapon can cause a build-up of rot stink exposure.

ThingDef.label: frostbound greataxe
ThingDef.description: A scourge knight greataxe further augmented via profane alchemy, allows the wielder to unleash a barrage of deadly ice shards.\n\nAttacks with this weapon can cause a build-up of frostbite.

li.label: ice shards
li.description: Unleash a barrage of deadly ice shards.

ThingDef.label: profaned scythe
ThingDef.description: A large, two-handed scythe adorned with bone. The favoured weapon of profaned cryptlurkers, in skilled hands it can deliver deadly slashes capable of slipping through an opponents guard.\n\nAttacks with this weapon can cause a build-up of rot stink exposure.

ThingDef.label: fading soul scythe
ThingDef.description: A profaned scythe infused with a fading soul via profane alchemy. The scythe will, independently of the wielder, lash out at nearby enemies with deadly soul shards.\n\nMelee attacks with this weapon can cause a build-up of rot stink exposure.

ThingDef.label: profaned glaive
ThingDef.description: A long, single edged polearm adorned with bone. A versatile weapon that can deliver deadly slashes and thrusts.\n\nAttacks with this weapon can cause a build-up of rot stink exposure.

ThingDef.label: abyssal glaive
ThingDef.description: A profaned glaive further augmented via profane alchemy. Allows to wielder to call upon the the abyss to assail an area, damaging anyone caught in the blast and causing them to flee in terror.\n\nMelee attacks with this weapon can cause a build-up of rot stink exposure.

li.label: abyssal call
li.description: Call upon the abyss to assail an area, causing anyone hit to flee in terror.

ThingDef.label: profaned staff
ThingDef.description: An ominous staff usually wielded by profaned gravetenders. After briefly charging, it fires a putrid, slow moving projectile that bursts on impact, spreading rot stink over the area.\n\nDue to its charge time and ineffectiveness as a melee weapon, it will leave the caster vulnerable at close range.

ThingDef.label: bloodflame staff
ThingDef.description: An ominous staff further augmented via profane alchemy. After briefly charging, it fires a bloodflame-infused, slow moving projectile that bursts on impact, burning and spreading rot stink over the area.\n\nIn addition to the regular attack, it allows the wielder to spew forth searing hot bloodflame, damaging and igniting anything caught in the surge.

li.label: bloodflame surge
li.description: Spew forth searing hot bloodflame, damaging and igniting anything caught in the surge.

ThingDef.label: profaned greatbow
ThingDef.description: A large, heavy greatbow adorned with bone. It is cumbersome to use but can fire deadly great arrows over a long distance.\n\nAttacks with this weapon can cause a build-up of rot stink exposure.

ThingDef.label: spectral greatbow
ThingDef.description: A greatbow augmented via profane alchemy. It fires a spread of three spectral arrows that will seek out their target.
